title: Spectate problem
body: I been trying t spectate my friends for a while when there playing the game. But for some reason every time I try to spectate it will not let me this been happening for at least 3 days now. I don't know what to do.

replies.body:
Are you using the *Beta Client?* If so, you'll have to hop into the Legacy Client to do so, as the Spectate feature hasn't made it to the Beta client just yet. You can access this at any time from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
